mapper.select: SELECT e.idEmpleado, e.persona, e.curp, e.username, e.correo, e.contrasenia, e.rol, e.estatus, CONCAT(p.nombrePersona, " ", p.apellidoPaterno, " ", p.apellidoMaterno) AS nombreEmpleado, p.telefono, es.nombreEstatus, ro.nombreRol FROM empleados e INNER JOIN personas p ON e.persona=p.idPersona INNER JOIN estatus es ON es.idEstatus = e.estatus INNER JOIN roles ro ON ro.idRol = e.rol

SELECT p.nombrePersona AS 'persona.nombrePersona', p.apellidoPaterno AS 'persona.apellidoPaterno', p.apellidoMaterno AS 'persona.apellidoMaterno', p.sexo AS 'persona.sexo', p.telefono AS 'persona.telefono', e.persona AS 'empleado.persona', e.curp AS 'empleado.curp', e.username AS 'empleado.username', e.correo AS 'empleado.correo', e.contrasenia AS 'empleado.contrasenia', e.rol AS 'empleado.rol', e.estatus AS 'empleado.estatus', e.fotografia AS 'empleado.fotografia' FROM empleados e INNER JOIN personas p ON e.persona=p.idPersona WHERE e.idEmpleado = #{idEmpleado}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM empleados WHERE idEmpleado=#{idEmpleado} AND sesion = 0;
